experience.title: Lead Frontend Developer
experience.description: A digital agency and design studio by IBM. Here I'm responsible for leading development and decision making for large-scale frontends, mostly driven by React, Node.js and headless CMS like Strapi and Magnolia. Also I'm working on some React Native and cross-platform apps. Other technologies include TypeScript, GraphQL, Java Spring Boot, etc.. Besides that I am mentoring trainees and junior React developers.

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
experience.description: A company specialized in quality assurance of software projects, well-known in the automobile industry. I helped developing the so-called Quality Commander, a huge project to visualize Big Data collected from other inhouse software. Used technologies are C# in backend and TypeScript, React as well as D3.js in frontend.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: A small digital agency based in Hanover where I dealt with the creation of websites, further development of existing websites, as well as the care for existing customers. In addition to PHP, Laravel, Statamic and WordPress, the technologies used include JavaScript, Flow, React for the development of Progressive Web Apps and also React Native for mobile development.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Originally hired as a developer for web-based software (e.g. for the Deutsche Messe AG and CeBIT), over time I took over more and more tasks and was responsible for the implementation of responsive websites and mobile apps, from conception to development towards implementation with PHP, JavaScript and CSS with well-known frameworks like Laravel, Angular, React and Bootstrap.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
experience.description: An agency, a subsidiary of the Nordwest-Zeitung, from which I was taken over after working at QP media GmbH. In addition to the independent development of responsive websites and WordPress theming, my activities also included the programming of NWZonline.de with Java and JavaServer Pages.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
experience.description: A small startup, sponsored by Nordwest-Zeitung, which dealt with couponing and printing vouchers. From the first day on I accompanied the startup and developed a well-known, regional coupon platform. Programming languages used included Python (with Django) and JavaScript as well as CoffeeScript with Backbone.js.
